items.title: Armed forces member who died in Ukraine named
items.description: Lance Corporal George Hooley was named by Sir Keir Starmer in the Commons during PMQs.

items.title: Man guilty of murdering ex-girlfriend's sister and three children in house fire
items.description: Bryonie Gawith and her children Denisty, Oscar and Aubree Birtle died in their home in Bradford.

items.title: 'A sense of panic' - what's going on in Turkish football?
items.description: A wide-ranging investigation into illegal gambling involving figures in Turkish football is underway with hundreds of players, club owners and referee...

items.title: Can you solve GCHQ's Christmas code-cracking challenge?
items.description: Do you have what it takes to crack GCHQ's Christmas codes?

items.title: US could ask UK tourists for five-year social media history before entry
items.description: The plan would affect people from countries, including the UK, which can fill out a form in lieu of a visa.
